attributes.action: Tell the Prime Minister the British public demand a general election now!
attributes.additional_details: To exercise the British publics to a democratic right to replace this chaotic and  continuously failing government.
attributes.background: To hold a general at the earliest opportunity, not after a vote buying budget or through the efforts of the Bank of England.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
